org.streaminer.stream.frequency

Class CCFCSketch

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.streaminer.stream.frequency.CCFCSketch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBaseFrequency<Integer>

    public class CCFCSketch
extends Object
implements IBaseFrequency<Integer>
    Count sketches from Charikar, Chen, Farach-Colton '02. They support: finding frequent items, returning point estimates.
    Author:
    Maycon Viana Bordin

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CCFCSketch(int buckets, int tests, int lgn, int gran)
      Create the data structure for Adaptive Group Testing Keep T tests.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CCFCSketch

        public CCFCSketch(int buckets,
          int tests,
          int lgn,
          int gran)
        Create the data structure for Adaptive Group Testing Keep T tests.
        Parameters:
        buckets - The number of buckets for each test
        tests - The number of tests
        lgn - The bit depth of the items which will arrive
        gran - gran = 1 means to do one bit at a time, gran = 8 means to do one quad at a time, etc.
